channel.title: Custom Silent Miner (XMR)
channel.description:
#######Monero Custom Silent Miner (XMR) for Windows#######
>>>Supported and tested on the following:
########Windows Version#######
>>>supporting all editions* x86 & x64*
Windows Vista (Longhorn) Windows 7 (Blackcomb, Vienna) Windows 8 (Blue) Windows 8.1 (Blue) Windows 10 (Threshold, Redstone)
########Servers#######
Windows Server 2003 Windows Server 2003 R2 Windows Server 2008 Windows Server 2008 R2 Windows Server 2012 Windows Server 2012 R2
#######Important details about the custom silent miner#######
>>>Persistent Boot Feature (It literally will not stop) >>>Deleting or removing the hidden task/process will just restart it. Restarting your PC or server will restart it. >>>Killswitch (optional) >>>Fully FUD, Don't worry about AVs. >>>If it's not working on Windows 10 try it without smartscreen enabled. A light version will be provided upon purchase as well. The only difference between the two silent miners is the light will not try to disable windows smart screen etc... You get two custom miners and a killswitch if needed. >>>xmrig-proxy setup (optional)
#######Linux/Unix Setup#######
Ubuntu/Debian Latest Centos/Fedora Latest FreedBSD Latest Tested on OpenSuse as well.
>>>The good thing about Linux and Unix is you won't have to worry about AVs.
>>>You should have some good rootkits available unless your focusing strictly on Windows (RDP) for your slaves/victims.
#######Requirements#######
1. XMR address (This is your XMR address used in the custom miner). 2. 24 hours MAX to create a custom miner FOR you. 3. Patience.
######Refunds or Money Back#######
>>>2 days or your money back. You won't need 2 days to see some results and a hashrate but for maximum performance have some spreading methods ready and it'll take about 15-20 mins to see a hashrate in the given pool.
>>>You can mess around with different pools but this works best with this pool and I will go into details if you're interested in the xmrig-proxy or not. Upon completion of purchase.
>>>You will have to be really unhappy and convice me you deserve a refund. Screenshots will be required for disputes.
#######Payment#######
>>>BTC, STORM, KIN, ENJ or XMR.
>>>$55 USD
#######If you have any questions don't hesitate to ask. PM here or jabber: mrlight@jabb.im#######
#######Happy Mining#######

item.title: Custom Silent Miner (XMR)
item.dc:creator: insulinparamedic
item.description:
#######Monero Custom Silent Miner (XMR) for Windows#######

Supported and tested on the following:

########Windows Version#######

supporting all editions* x86 & x64*

Windows Vista (Longhorn)
Windows 7 (Blackcomb, Vienna)
Windows 8 (Blue)
Windows 8.1 (Blue)
Windows 10 (Threshold, Redstone)

########Servers#######

Windows Server 2003
Windows Server 2003 R2
Windows Server 2008
Windows Server 2008 R2
Windows Server 2012
Windows Server 2012 R2

#######Important details about the custom silent miner#######

Persistent Boot Feature (It literally will not stop)
Deleting or removing the hidden task/process will just restart it. Restarting your PC or server will restart it.
Killswitch (optional)
Fully FUD, Don’t worry about AVs.
If it’s not working on Windows 10 try it without smartscreen enabled. A light version will be provided upon purchase as well. The only difference between the two silent miners is the light will not try to disable windows smart screen etc… You get two custom miners and a killswitch if needed.
xmrig-proxy setup (optional)

#######Linux/Unix Setup#######

Ubuntu/Debian Latest
Centos/Fedora Latest
FreedBSD Latest
Tested on OpenSuse as well.

The good thing about Linux and Unix is you won’t have to worry about AVs.

You should have some good rootkits available unless your focusing strictly on Windows (RDP) for your slaves/victims.

#######Requirements#######

  1. XMR address (This is your XMR address used in the custom miner).
  2. 24 hours MAX to create a custom miner FOR you.
  3. Patience.

######Refunds or Money Back#######

2 days or your money back. You won’t need 2 days to see some results and a hashrate but for maximum performance have some spreading methods ready and it’ll take about 15-20 mins to see a hashrate in the given pool.

You can mess around with different pools but this works best with this pool and I will go into details if you’re interested in the xmrig-proxy or not. Upon completion of purchase.

You will have to be really unhappy and convice me you deserve a refund. Screenshots will be required for disputes.

#######Payment#######

BTC, STORM, KIN, ENJ or XMR.

$55 USD

#######If you have any questions don’t hesitate to ask. PM here or jabber: mrlight@jabb.im#######

#######Happy Mining#######
